item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
I am using database snapshots on a mirrored DB for one type of ad-hoc queries where they want to see as of yesterday

I also use your favorite tool (Excel) connecting to a SSAS cube which gets build every 5 minutes (small cube) to see what people are clicking on in near real time, it also eliminated any of my time to write queries, the can slice and dice it however they want…users are happy and I am happy ðŸ™‚
